casebody.data:
Jason T. ALLEN, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
CHARLEVOIX ABSTRACT & ENGINEERING COMPANY and Accident Fund Insurance Company of America, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 157037
COA: 339123 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 30, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 7, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
